channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Is Saudi Arabia pausing its ambitious desert city, ‘The Line’?
Indian student, missing for 19 days, found dead inside dam in Russia: What we know so far
What’s the ‘Patriot of the Year’ award that Melania Trump recieved?
Are music and PT 'un-Islamic'? How Bangladesh govt ban on teachers has triggered protests in Dhaka
Is Pakistan’s 27th Amendment to Constitution the end of civilian rule?
What’s behind the massive Delhi airport chaos that led to 100 flight delays?
How Trishul exercise marks India’s shift from ‘Cold Start’ to ‘Cold Strike’ doctrine
item.description: For the broader strategic community, the message from Trishul is unambiguous. India has entered the phase of technological deterrence, where strength is measured not only by numbers or firepower but by integration, speed and autonomy

item.title: How America’s revival of nuclear testing could open Pandora’s box
item.description: Trump must recognise that nuclear weapons alone cannot sustain America’s image of strength and global leadership

item.title: Peace in South Caucasus will strengthen India-Armenia inter-regional cooperation
item.description: Even though India currently does not have a dedicated South Caucasus policy, and certain serious issues with Azerbaijan and Turkey hamper closer engagement, efforts must be made to iron out differences through dialogue and diplomacy

item.title: Trump’s nuclear bombshell: A wake-up call for India’s security calculus
item.description: While it is true that US President Donald Trump’s statements tend to be exaggerated or even incorrect, it is also true that he often let the cat out of the bag regarding intelligence assessments

item.title: Will Zohran Mamdani transform New York into a Khalistan safe haven?
item.description: Zohran Mamdani embraces cosmetic diversity, but his record with the Democratic Socialists of America and at Bowdoin College suggests he is intolerant of diversity of views

item.title: Head-on | Trump-Xi G2 duopoly is not the future world order
item.description: Indian policymakers and analysts are easily swayed by the optics around the US-China G2 duopoly. A closer look reveals how tenuous the G2 formulation is
